bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of difficulties in the region of the nape in raising or lowering the head accompanied by uncomfortable contraction. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 9: 治患霧氣者，心內煩悶少 氣，頭痛項急，起則眼眩欲倒，身微熱，戰掉不安，時復憎寒，心中欲 吐，吐時無物方 , “Recipe to cure patients suffering from fog qi, with vexation, heart-pressure and diminished qi, headaches and nape tension . When one rises, the eyes turn dizzy and one is likely to fall to the ground. The body is mildly hot and restless. Time and again it has an aversion to cold. In the center there is an urge to vomit, but the vomiting has no matter to be thrown up”.
